name: Smart City Meter Data Platform (HES/MDM)
description: Developed a scalable Meter Data Management System for smart-city IoT devices. Implemented analytics dashboards, alerting, and data synchronization modules.

name: Golden Record Citizen Portal – Govt. of Maharashtra
description: Citizen-centric portal enabling multilingual onboarding and document management. Implemented caching with Redis, PDF export, and role-based workflows.

name: Smart Outsourcing & Recruitment Platform
description: Dynamic Form Builder and onboarding workflow for Radixweb’s HR automation. Integrated Merge-Tags, NPS, and analytics dashboard.

name: FormPilot (Hackathon PoC)
description: AI-driven Form Builder that transforms natural language into JSON-based dynamic forms. Built with LLM APIs and Azure AI Foundry.
